classes.title: HUNG411
classes.subtitle: Introduction to Hungarian Literature.  3 Credits.
classes.description: An introduction to Hungarian literature of the last five centuries through a selection of works in English translation, with supporting background materials including films (with English subtitles). Taught in English; some readings in Hungarian for qualified students.Gen Ed: LA, BN.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: HUNG490
classes.subtitle: Topics in Hungarian Culture.  3 Credits.
classes.description: An introduction to Hungarian literature of the last five centuries through a selection of works in English translation, with supporting background materials including films (with English subtitles). Taught in English; some readings in Hungarian for qualified students.Gen Ed: LA, BN.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: HUNG490
classes.subtitle: Topics in Hungarian Culture.  3 Credits.
classes.description: Study of topics in Hungarian literature and culture not currently covered in any other course. The specific topic will be announced in advance. Taught in English; some readings in Hungarian for qualified students.Repeat rules: May be repeated for credit; may be repeated in the same term for different topics; 12 total credits. 4 total completions.Grading status: Letter grade.
